description:
When it comes to free online TV show streaming, Canadians don't have nearly as many outlets as Americans. However, there are a handful of quality websites that work. And better yet, they work on the TouchPad's flash player!

Canuck TV collects these available websites and presents them in stylish webOS app frontend. Currently it supports:
- CTV
- Space
- Comedy Network
- TSN
- MuchMusic
- Discovery Channel
- Bravo! Canada
- Business News Network

It should be noted that the TV providers have geo-restricted many of the shows to Canadians-only. This was not my doing. Any ads are also a product of the TV providers and not my doing.

If you know of another Canadian online TV streaming webpage & would like to submit it for Canuck TV, email it to me at support@canuckcoding.ca
